law.catch_line: Sourcing of retail sales -- Communications services, digital property, and florist wire sales.

section.section: Nothing included in this subsection shall affect the obligation of a purchaser to remit use tax pursuant to KRS 139.310.

text.section: Florist wire sales shall be sourced in accordance with an administrative regulation promulgated by the department.
Advertising and promotional direct mail and other direct mail shall be sourced as provided in KRS 139.777.

law.history: Amended 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 33, sec 2, effective July 1, 2011. -- Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 73, sec. 2, effective July 1, 2009. -- Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 2, effective July 1, 2007. -- Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 154, sec. 1, effective June 20, 2005. -- Created 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 124, sec. 23, effective July 1, 2004.
